hadiths.text: It was narrated from 'Aishah that:whenever the Prophet (saas) went to bed, he would blow into his hands, recite Al-Mu'awwidhatain, then wipe his hands over his body

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا يَدْعُو بِهِ إِذَا أَوَى إِلَى فِرَاشِهِ
chapter.eng-name: : What One Should Say When Going To Bed
